snippet: Crews spent Friday clearing trees and reaching stranded visitors at Great Smoky Mountains National Park, a day after violent thunderstorms swept through the popular tourist spot.
abstract: Crews in Tennessee clear trees and reach stranded visitors at Great Smoky Mountains National Park a day after violent thunderstorms swept through the popular tourist spot, killing at least two people and injuring several others.
lead_paragraph: Crews spent Friday clearing trees and reaching stranded visitors at Great Smoky Mountains National Park, a day after violent thunderstorms swept through the popular tourist spot.

headline.main: Tennessee: Storms Kill Two in Smoky Mountains Park
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Storms Kill Two In Smoky Mountains Park
